alert.note: Alert for McKenzie; Mountrail (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 3:37PM CST until November 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST/11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle. Ice accumulations of a glaze. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches. * WHERE...McKenzie and Mountrail Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight CST/11 PM MST/ tonight. For the Winter Storm Warning, from Midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to Midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
